information: The company WILHELM RIEGER GMBH, is a Wholesaler, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Textiles - preparation, spinning and weaving machinery, Weaving - machinery and equipment, and Textiles - finishing, printing and dyeing machinery industries. It is based in Leonberg, Germany.
